title: 5 mins to get back into client
body: After a game ends on the new client, it takes about 5-10 minutes to get back into the client so i can start a new game. This has become very inconvenient for me and my friend when we decide to play together because we have to wait 5-10 minute intervals before going into a game. So we'd spend about 3 hours playing with only about 3-4 games being played. Please look into this, because i know you guys are trying to make it so only the new client is being played but im sure many others are having the same problem and have to stick to the old client.

replies.body: It definitely shouldn't be taking *that* long to get the after match lobby to pull up, so I'm curious if there is something blocking your connection from grabbing that match data from our servers. Take a minute to go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we hit the usual suspects, and let me know how that helps!
